definition: powder/cosmetic face powder/food prepared from starch/noodles or pasta made from any kind of flour/whitewash/white/pink

sentences.english: The inulin hydrogen breath test accurately reflects orocaecal transit time.
sentences.chinese: 菊粉氢呼气试验精确反映口盲传输时间。

sentences.english: It predicts the prospect of inulin.
sentences.chinese: 展望了菊粉的应用前景。

sentences.english: Inulin hydrolysis appeared to be the limiting factor of the fermentation rate.
sentences.chinese: 菊粉水解似乎是限制因素的发酵率。

sentences.english: Degree of substitution( DS ) of carboxymethylinulin was analysed by spectrophotometric titration.
sentences.chinese: 用光度滴定法测定了羧甲基菊粉的取代度。

sentences.english: The inulin market is booming in China recently.
sentences.chinese: 近几年，中国的菊粉市场逐渐兴起。

sentences.english: The inulinase activity increased paralleled by the mycelium growth.
sentences.chinese: 菊粉酶活性平行地随菌体生长而增加。

definition: Stevia extract, used as sugar substitute
sorbitol C6H14O6 (sugar substitute and mild laxative)
polysaccharide (complex carbohydrate such as starch 澱粉|淀粉 and cellulose 纖維素|纤维素)
